name: createLogShippingConfiguration
description: Create a log shipping configuration between a specified primary database and a specified secondary database. The transaction logs from the primary database are regularly restored to the secondary database in order to maintain the secondary database as a point-in-time copy of the primary database. The primary database must have log backups configured, and it must be in the full or bulk-logged recovery model.

id.description: ID of the primary database object.

body.description: Object containing the values of a log shipping configuration.

$ul: **endTime**: The end time of the request.
**message**: The error message for failed IDs.
**id**: The ID of the request object used to poll the status.
**nodeId**: The ID of the node where the job ran.
**progress**: The current percentage progress of the asynchronous request.
**startTime**: The start time of the request.
